directions: Place lettuce, red onion, and strawberries in a large bowl. Place creamy salad dressing, sugar, milk, vinegar, and poppy seeds in a jar with a tight-fitting lid; cover jar and shake until smooth. Pour dressing over salad; toss to combine.
ingredients: 1 head green leaf lettuce - rinsed, dried, and chopped
1/2 cup creamy salad dressing (such as Miracle Whip®)
title: Chelsey's Strawberry Salad with Poppy Seed Dressing
